channel.title: Irc
channel.description:
Well, I haven't been able to get on IRC for a while now. I am using MIRC to connect to irc.moparisthebest.com and get this message
[code]* Connecting to irc.moparisthebest.com (6667) - -mitb.moparisthebest.com- *** Looking up your hostname... - -mitb.moparisthebest.com- *** Couldn't resolve your hostname; using your IP address instead - Welcome to the moparisthebest IRC Network Phaze!Tyler@###.###.###.## Your host is mitb.moparisthebest.com, running version Unreal3.2.8.1 This server was created Thu Jan 13 2011 at 15:42:40 PST - mitb.moparisthebest.com Unreal3.2.8.1 iowghraAsORTVSxNCWqBzvdHtGp lvhopsmntikrRcaqOALQbSeIKVfMCuzNTGj - UHNAMES NAMESX SAFELIST HCN MAXCHANNELS=10 CHANLIMIT=#:10 MAXLIST=b:60,e:60,I:60 NICKLEN=30 CHANNELLEN=32 TOPICLEN=307 KICKLEN=307 AWAYLEN=307 MAXTARGETS=20 are supported by this server WALLCHOPS WATCH=128 WATCHOPTS=A SILENCE=15 MODES=12 CHANTYPES=# PREFIX=(qaohv)~&@%+ CHANMODES=beI,kfL,lj,psmntirRcOAQKVCuzNSMTG NETWORK=moparisthebest CASEMAPPING=ascii EXTBAN=~,cqnrT ELIST=MNUCT STATUSMSG=~&@%+ are supported by this server EXCEPTS INVEX CMDS=KNOCK,MAP,DCCALLOW,USERIP are supported by this server[/code]
Seems normal, right? After that, per usual I type /join #moparscape. And nothing happens. After about a minute I get a disconnection via software connection abort. The same is for the IRC webclient. Anyone have any ideas?

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I didnt ask if you connected through a proxy, i asked if you ran one, or possibly a web server.

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

No proxy, the connection is run straight

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Do you run a proxy on your internet connection? If so you may have been automatically banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:6, topic:378815”]I have tried XChat but still recieve the same error[/quote]The first time I logged into the IRC server I got immediately banned by technical fault and I had the same symptoms as you. I’d say your hostname is banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I have tried xchat but still recieve the same error

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Your not the only one having these issues.

IRC Joining Guide

Sorry to bring up this ancient thread, but my concern is related to the IRC server. I use the mIRC client, but when I connected to the MITB server and attempted to join both #mopar or #moparscape I was immediately banned upon entry. Any chance this could be reversed?

Try using Xchat 2, I have never had any problems with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I’ve tried #runescape, #mopar etc and nothing. Also i’ve noticed you have to pay for MIRC now?

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Looks normal to me, did you try joining a different channel?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You might be banned…

Well, I haven’t been able to get on IRC for a while now. I am using MIRC to connect to irc.moparisthebest.com and get this message

[code]* Connecting to irc.moparisthebest.com (6667)

-mitb.moparisthebest.com- *** Looking up your hostname…

EXCEPTS INVEX CMDS=KNOCK,MAP,DCCALLOW,USERIP are supported by this server[/code]

Seems normal, right? After that, per usual I type /join #moparscape. And nothing happens. After about a minute I get a disconnection via software connection abort. The same is for the IRC webclient. Anyone have any ideas?
